revised_title: Discovering the True Situation of the Ancient City Industria
tldr: This article discusses the discovery of a curious antique Tripos and an inscription found near Turin, which helped in discovering the true location of the ancient city of Industria. The authors explain the reading of each word, provide comments, and describe Roman customs and offices related to the inscription. They also mention other inscriptions found at the same location, which support their findings.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
